name: Settings
description: View and manage application settings including model selection and log configuration.

functions.name: list_providers
functions.description: List all configured AI providers. Returns provider names, types, and status. API keys are never exposed.

functions.name: list_models
functions.description: List available models for a specific provider.

functions.name: get_active_model
functions.description: Get the currently active model and its provider.

functions.name: set_active_model
functions.description: Set the active model by its database ID. Use list_models first to find the correct ID.

functions.name: get_log_config
functions.description: Get all log configuration including per-area log levels, known areas, and retention settings.

functions.name: set_log_level
functions.description: Set log levels for a specific area. You can set userLevel, devLevel, or both.

userLevel.description: User-facing log level: silent, low, medium, or high

devLevel.description: Developer log level: silent, debug, or verbose

functions.name: set_log_retention
functions.description: Set the number of days to retain logs before auto-pruning.

days.description: Number of days to retain logs (1-365)
